summary: A cult fan favorite documentary which explores the rise and fall of Showbiz Pizza Place, it's animatronic rock band, and the origins of Chuck E. Cheese's.
cast: Chris Thrash|Aaron Fechter|Travis Schafer|Mike Scherpenberg|Damon E. Breland|Kerry Fechter|Paul Teneyuca|Sandy Thrash
title: The Rock-afire Explosion
